Over 900 of you voted & the results for 2022's #CityHallSelfie People's Choice Awards are in - this year's winner: @GoodyearAZGov!

Don’t forget to keep taking #CityHallSelfies when you travel to new communities & save the date for Aug 15, 2023! https://t.co/eMBBmlVfA9 https://t.co/W3Dzw32BmP
